org.graphstream.algorithm
Interface DynamicAlgorithm

All Superinterfaces:
Algorithm
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConnectedComponents, Modularity, RandomWalk
public interface DynamicAlgorithm
extends Algorithm

Base for algorithms that can compute and maintain a property on a dynamic graph, during its evolution.

This is the same as the Algorithm interface, with the addition of methods to make the algorithm dynamic. The algorithm begins with a call to the Algorithm.init(org.graphstream.graph.Graph) method and ends with a call to the terminate() method. In between, the user must call Algorithm.compute() in a loop, as long as the graph evolves.

Method Summary
 void terminate()
          End the dynamic algorithm.
 
Methods inherited from interface org.graphstream.algorithm.Algorithm
compute, init
